author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-2510 Ensure configuration is provided to components even if the Configuration Admin service is registered after Declarative Services has started. To this avail, a ServiceListener is registered, which handled the Configuration Admin service registration by calling the configurationEvent method for existing configurations.
